ja490:4.1: uragā dujivha → uraga dvijivha (bj); uraga dujivha (sya1ed, sya2ed); uragaddujivha (pts-vp-pli1)
ja490:6.2: Kanditvā roditvā → kanditvā roditva (bj); kanditva roditva (pts-vp-pli1)
ja490:12.2: Atricchatā → atricchatāya (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1) | mallagāmaṃ → malataṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1); mallayataṃ (mr)
ja490:16.1: Evampahaṃ vandi na → evampahaṃ naggahe (bj, pts-vp-pli1); evampihaṃ vandi na (sya1ed, sya2ed)
